content:
AISHWARYA SINGH                 aishwaryasingh2431@gmail.com 

Systems Engineer                                           (+91)8447086673 

Oracle 12c PL/SQL Development Support Executive having 3.6 years of experience developing and 
modifying SQL queries to access and refine financial data. Managed all Production Issues with 
assigned applications (MDM, ETL, Salesforce, Orchestra, DIF and JMS).Experienced in writing 
database scripts, query optimisation along with Application Database Maintenance, Unix OS 
Administration and Shell Scripting. 

PROFESSIONAL BACKGROUND 

Deutsche Bank AG- Tata Consultancy Services    July ’16 - August’19 

Reference Data Services (RDS) | Banking and Finance Domain 

 Have worked closely with Production Support team managing the live data of the Bank by 
resolving the Data Quality and Discrepancy issues from the backend, providing the Root 
Cause Analysis for the issues, fixing the bugs, providing tactical and strategic resolutions. 

 Oracle Database backup and maintenance of SQL Seeding Views and Stored procedures. 

 Have created automated jobs and scripts in Oracle to process the data in timely manner, to 
monitor discrepancies in data, failure of jobs and delay in various data processing systems. 

 Master Data Management (MDM) of bank’s critical live data using Salesforce CRM, 
Orchestra Networks. 

 Worked on ETL tools to make the data accessible, meaningful, and usable across disparate 
data systems. 

 Hands-On is various tools like Informatica MDM Hub Console, Control-M Workflow 
management Tool, DAP Servers, Geneos Monitoring Tool along with SaS CRM Salesforce. 

 Orchestrated efficient large-scale software deployments, including testing features and 
correcting code on Data Integration Framework (DIF). 

 Designed and implemented dashboards and tailored reports for Geneos, a monitoring tool 
from ITRS which provides real-time visibility of the performance by collecting and analyzing 
vast amount of data. 

 Applied ITIL and Agile approach to Change, Incident, Knowledge and Problem Management 
and to meet defined SLA and improve MTTR. 

 Participated Pro-actively in Disaster Recovery activities and share weekly plan and respective 
task for any changes that are going in production. 

 Developed and maintained troubleshooting Knowledge Books (KBs) for Incident 
Management team.  

Boehringer Ingelheim- Tata Consultancy Services                                     August’19 - Present                                                                                          

GTM Content Production Services | Life Sciences Domain 

 Working with GIT and JIRA, delivering agile projects hosted on CMS Drupal 8. 

 Integrated data into Salesforce applications. 

 Leveraged clients existing IT framework/CRM system for better data visibility and system 
integration. 

 Gathered requirements, estimated LOE and created functional requirements for key 
Salesforce projects. 

 Additionally assisting in project proposal development as well as Super User & End User 
Training. 

 Supervising the integration of Front end Applications with the Database. 

 

TECHNOLOGIES     

Oracle 12c, SQL, PL-SQL, Salesforce, UNIX Shell Scripting, Drupal 8.

	Technology Used
	Ab Intio GDE, Oracle , Unix



Description:
Employee Repository project deals with support and enhancements of Employee repository of Walgreens that integrates data from multiple sources based on certain business rule and load the database. 

Responsibilities:
· Involved in providing support to all Employee Repository ETL extraction and loading batches at offshore timings.
· Providing support to Employee Information Services application as well which is responsible for providing feed files of SED data to many dependent systems like Kronos,  Payroll etc.
· Provided one time as well as permanent fixes to adhoc issues/failures reported in the system.
· Well coordinated with the other source/destination systems for issues resolutions.
· Acknowledge all the incidents rose by users on time and provided solution.
· Ensured daily status tracker and other support related sheets delivery on time.
· Managed team activities to provide root cause analysis to all reported issues. Received client appreciation many times.
· Attend daily scrum call and Sprint calls with the clients. Also attend business call on every Tuesday to discuss major issues with business users.
· Documented TRD, FRD, BRD and Traceability matrix.
· Created a shell script for archival and purging old files, which saved manual efforts, batch failures and also $2000 billing annually.  

	ACHIVEMENTS


· Organized CSR activity at organization level for underprivileged children.
· Awarded fresher of the year in 2017 for delivering requirements on time and for solving Production issues in a short span of time.
· Conducting weekend classes for weaker section of society.
· Participated in many Procom Quiz and Olympiads at school level.
· Participated in Cultural events at School Level.

	DECLARATION


I hereby declare that all the data and information provided above are true and correct to the
best of my knowledge.

Ashish Garg

content:
Open Macro window
ALT+F11

Excel objects

Workbooks, Worksheets, Range, Row, Column, Cell

Open a file dialog

	Sub OpenNewBox()
Dim xFilePath As String
Dim xObjFD As FileDialog
Set xObjFD = Application.FileDialog(msoFileDialogFilePicker)
  With xObjFD
        .AllowMultiSelect = False
        .Filters.Add "Excel Files", "*.xls; *.xlsx; *.xlsm; *.xlsb"
        .Show
        If .SelectedItems.Count > 0 Then
            xFilePath = .SelectedItems.Item(1)
        Else
            Exit Sub
        End If
    End With
    Workbooks.Open xFilePath
End Sub




Open a filefolder dialog

	Function GetFolder() As String
    Dim fldr As FileDialog
    Dim sItem As String
    Set fldr = Application.FileDialog(msoFileDialogFolderPicker)
    With fldr
        .Title = "Select a Folder"
        .AllowMultiSelect = False
        .InitialFileName = Application.DefaultFilePath
        If .Show < > -1 Then GoTo NextCode
        sItem = .SelectedItems(1)
    End With
NextCode:
    GetFolder = sItem
    Set fldr = Nothing
End Function



Send email
	Function sendMail() As Integer
    Dim OutApp As Object
    Dim OutMail As Object
    Dim recipient
    
    recipient = TextBox2.Text
    
    Set OutApp = CreateObject("Outlook.Application")
    Set OutMail = OutApp.CreateItem(0)
    On Error Resume Next
    checkMailId
    With OutMail
        .to = recipient
        '.CC =""
        '.BCC = ""
        .Subject = "Test Mail"
        .Body = TextBox1.Text
        .HTMLBody = "Hi< br>< br>" & RangetoHTML(Sheets(1).Range("a1:b2")) & "< br>< br>Thanks"
        .Attachments.Add ActiveWorkbook.FullName
        
        .BodyFormat = olFormatHTML
        'You can add other files also like this
        '.Attachments.Add ("C:\test.txt")
        .Send
        '.Display
    End With
    'Set CurrWatcher = New EmailWatcher
    'Set CurrWatcher.BoolRange = Range("G12")
    'Set CurrWatcher.TheMail = oMail
    If OutMail.Sent Then
        MsgBox "Mail sent"
    Else
        MsgBox "Mail not sent"
    End If
    On Error GoTo 0
    Set OutMail = Nothing
    Set OutApp = Nothing
    sendMail = 1
End Function



Applying filter
	With Worksheets("Sheet1")
    .Range("$A:$E").AutoFilter
    .Range("$A:$E").AutoFilter field:=1, Criteria1:="#N/A"
    .Range("$A:$E").AutoFilter field:=2, Criteria1:="=String1", Operator:=xlOr, Criteria2:="=string2"
    .Range("$A:$E").AutoFilter field:=3, Criteria1:=">0"
    .Range("$A:$E").AutoFilter field:=5, Criteria1:="Number"
    LastRow = .Range("A" & .Rows.Count).End(xlUp).Row
    .Range("A1:A" & LastRow).SpecialCells(xlCellTypeVisible).EntireRow.Copy _
            Destination:=Sheets("Sheet2").Range("A1")
End With



Removing filter
	Sheet1.AutoFilterMode = False



Fill color
	Range("A1").Interior.Color = RGB(255, 0, 0)



Update status bar
	Application.StatusBar = "Your message"



Range copy and paste
	    'The Range.Copy Method - Copy & Paste with 1 line
    Range("A1").Copy Range("C1")
    Range("A1:A3").Copy Range("D1:D3")
    Range("A1:A3").Copy Range("D1")
    
    'Range.Copy to other worksheets
    Worksheets("Sheet1").Range("A1").Copy Worksheets("Sheet2").Range("A1")
 
    'Range.Copy to other workbooks
    Workbooks("Book1.xlsx").Worksheets("Sheet1").Range("A1").Copy _
            Workbooks("Book2.xlsx").Worksheets("Sheet1").Range("A1")



Paste special
	    'Copy and PasteSpecial a Range
    Range("A1").Copy
    Range("A3").PasteSpecial Paste:=xlPasteFormats
    
    'Copy and PasteSpecial a between worksheets
    Worksheets("Sheet1").Range("A2").Copy 
    Worksheets("Sheet2").Range("A2").PasteSpecial Paste:=xlPasteFormulas
    
    'Copy and PasteSpecial between workbooks
    Workbooks("Book1.xlsx").Worksheets("Sheet1").Range("A1").Copy
    Workbooks("Book2.xlsx").Worksheets("Sheet1").Range("A1").PasteSpecial Paste:=xlPasteFormats
    
    'Disable marching ants around copied range
    Application.CutCopyMode = False



Exit copy-cut mode
	Application.cutcopymode = false



Loops
	For i = 1 To 6
    Cells(i, 1).Value = 100
Next i



	i = 1

Do While i <  6
    Cells(i, 1).Value = 20
    i = i + 1
Loop



	While < expression>
     Codes..
Wend



If Else
	If < Boolean_expressions> Then
    ..statement 1
ElseIf
    ..statement 2
Else
    ..statement 3
End If



Other useful functions
Len, Mid, Instr, CStr(), StrComp(s1, s2, 1), Date(), CDate(), DateDiff(), Day(), Month(), Year(), MonthName(), WeekDay(), WeekDayName(), etc.

content:
MANGAL SINGH 

Contact: +91-9017537618                                                                      E-Mail: mangal.malik3@gmail.com 

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 

• Around 1 Year and 8+ months of Professional experience in System Analysis, Design, Development, 
Implementation, Production Support and Maintenance of Data Warehouse Business Applications in the 
Healthcare and Insurance industry. 

• Involved in understanding and translating the business requirement into Physical and logical data models by 
using various data modeling techniques. 

• Worked on data profiling activities at source and target objects and designed source to target mapping and 
technical design documents. 

• Extensive experience in the development of Extraction, Transformation, Loading (ETL) workflows, 
mappings and other objects which fetch the data from various sources into Data Warehouses and Data Marts 
using Informatica Power Center 10.2/9.6/ 9.1, Oracle 11g/10g. 

• Well versed in concepts of performance tuning of Informatica mappings and sessions for optimum 
performance. 

• Worked on implementation, analysis and tuning of complex SQL queries and integrated them with 
Informatica codes to drastically reduce the run time of workflows. 

• Created UNIX shell scripts to automate various manual tasks resulting in removal of manual intervention 
and reduction of effort. 
 

TECHNICAL SKILLS 

ETL tools    : Informatica 9.1, 9.6 and 10.2, SSIS 
Reporting tools               : Cognos, SSRS, SAP BO 
Database    : Oracle 10g,11g, Netezza 
Languages                :            Oracle PL/SQL 
Incident management tool : Service Market Place 
Programming Languages : Python, UNIX shell scripting 
Scheduling Tool  : Tidal 
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 

Working At :  Infosys Limited 

Job title : Systems Engineer 

Role  : ETL Informatica Application support and development 

Duration :  June 2018 - Till Date 

 

Project 1: Third party administrator Project      (Feb 2019- Nov 2019) 

Roles and Responsibilities:  

• As developer in the project, POC for the business stake holders and technical team members  
• Participated in the high-level design. Involved in ETL strategy and the overall design approach for the 

project. 
• Involved in created Source to target mapping document and converting the business rules into transformation 

rules. 
• Developed Informatica mappings and workflows as per the agreed Source to target mapping document. 
• Implemented various optimization techniques both at Informatica, Oracle level. Push down optimization to 

achieve optimum performance – In Informatica. Indexing, Gathering Stats etc. at database level. 
• Involved in creating the Unit Test Plan and for Execution of the Unit Test Cases. 
• Created various project documents as in Technical design document, Project Implementation Plan, 

Deployment checklist etc. 
• Created UNIX scripts for archiving the files and sending email notification for sending the load status to all 

the stakeholders. 

mailto:mangal.malik3@gmail.com


• Involved in QA support – helped the team to understand the requirement and provided them all the required 
documentation (like UTP etc.) and information to expedite the testing which helped in meeting the deadlines 
for code migration. 

 

Project 2: Web-portal repository (WPR)      (December 2018- till date) 

Roles & Responsibilities:  

• Responsible for supporting Informatica applications which fetch the member and claims data from data 
warehouse and populate the data marts which are used by the downstream team to show the data on client’s 
website. 

• Worked proactively on automating the process to run the workflows at scheduled time to remove the manual 
intervention and avoiding human errors. 

• Created UNIX scripts to validate the source files and removing any bad data which might violate the parent-
child relationship in the RDBMS system and resulting in job failures. 

• Extensively worked on SQL*Loader to load the data from flat files database tables in Oracle.  
• Performed root cause analysis on the issues raised by members and providers by analyzing complex 

mappings, SQL queries and UNIX scripts. 

• Analyzed the various bottlenecks at Informatica mappings and SQL level and tuned them to reduce the job 
run time ensuring timely availability of data to business. 

• Closely worked with onshore counterparts and helped business in all their data related queries. 
 

Project 3: Enterprise Information Systems (EIS)     (December 2018- till date)  

       

Responsibilities:  

• To maintain 35 different Informatica applications which fetches various types of healthcare data from various 
source systems and loads in to target system as per the business requirements. 

• Proactively found the avenues of application improvement and performance tuning of various Informatica 
and database objects. 

• Fixed the bugs in the existing production Informatica code and improved the code to prevent the reoccurring 
production issues.  

• Involved in enhancement and maintenance related activities of the data warehouse including performance 
tuning, rewriting of SQL queries for code enhancement. 

• Closely worked with the reporting team to make sure that the correct data is being presented to business and 
solved all the business queries related to report data. 

• Extensively worked with Business teams to modify the existing functionality and deployed code to higher 
environments to meet the deadlines. 

• Made sure that all the applications are processing data within SLA so that Business can get required data on 
time. 

• Performed root cause analysis on all the batch failures and took necessary steps to resolve the issue within 
SLA. 

• Extensively worked in onshore-offshore model and various shifts to ensure 24*7 Production support for data 
warehousing. 

 

ACADEMIC QUALIFICATIONS     

• B.Tech. in Computer Science & Engineering from Maharaja Surajmal Institute of Technology with 80.35% 
marks. 

 

TRAININGS AND CERTIFICATIONS  

• Infosys Certification of Informatica. 
• Trained at Infosys Mysore in MSBI (SSMS, SSIS, SSRS, SSAS) involved in a small project to understand 

how ETL and reporting works together.

As developer in the project, POC for the business stake holders and technical team members  
• Participated in the high-level design. Involved in ETL strategy and the overall design approach for the 

project

Created UNIX shell scripts to automate various manual tasks resulting in removal of manual intervention 
and reduction of effort

Worked on implementation, analysis and tuning of complex SQL queries and integrated them with 
Informatica codes to drastically reduce the run time of workflows

Extensive experience in the development of Extraction, Transformation, Loading (ETL) workflows, 
mappings and other objects which fetch the data from various sources into Data Warehouses and Data Marts 
using Informatica Power Center 10.2/9.6/ 9.1, Oracle 11g/10g

Worked on data profiling activities at source and target objects and designed source to target mapping and 
technical design documents

Involved in understanding and translating the business requirement into Physical and logical data models by 
using various data modeling techniques

Around 1 Year and 8+ months of Professional experience in System Analysis, Design, Development, 
Implementation, Production Support and Maintenance of Data Warehouse Business Applications in the 
Healthcare and Insurance industry

 Tableau Professional 

Overview technical background Total Experience is 4.2 years in SAP Business intelligence including End-to-End implementation. 

Technical Exploration and work experience.
· Having more than 4.2 years of professional IT experience in the areas of Business Intelligence tools Tableau and SQL.
· Experience in Analysis, design, development and Implementation of Business Intelligence solutions in various verticals such as Finance, Health Care etc.
· Having good understanding of Tableau architecture, design, development and end user experience.
· Experience in Tableau Desktop, Tableau Server and Tableau Reader in various versions of Tableau 9.x/10.x
· Experience in Tableau Desktop and Server creating highly interactive Data visualization Reports and dashboards using Data Blending, Extracts, Calculation Fields, LOD, Filters, Actions, Parameters, Context Filters, Sets, Groups, Aggregate measures, etc.
· Worked on the development of Dashboard reports for the Key Performance Indicators for the top management.
· Worked with Live Connections, Tableau Data Extracts and Legacy Connections in Tableau Desktop.
· Experience in creating different visualizations using Bars, Lines and Pies, Maps, Scatter plots, Bubbles, Histograms, Bullets, Heat maps and Highlight tables.
· Experienced in developing rich Interactive reports and dashboards integrating various reporting components from multiple sources.
· Excellent analytical, problem solving and debugging skills, with strong ability to quickly learn and comprehend business processes and problems in order to effectively develop technical solutions to their requirement.
· Self-starter with good understanding and goal oriented approach to Problem Solving issues and extremely detail Oriented.
· Strength in finding custom solutions to specific business or technical problems.
· Excellent Analytical Skills, Oral, Communication skills, Interpersonal skills and documentation skills.

Projects Summary.

E                                        Client    	:    Tata Power
KPI                                   Duration   :    April 2019 to Till Date
Tracker                            Role     	:   Business Intelligence Consultant  
                   Tools/Languages  :    Tableau Desktop 2018.1, Tableau Server Oracle, SQL                 
                                                                     Sever.                     

Project Description
This Data warehouse was designed to generate reports for the Inventory and warehouse. This warehouse is to generate reports and analyse the sales of power and purchase. 
Generated the reports using tableau as reporting tool and created different kind of reports like monthly sales, product wise sales, profit and target sales. This warehouse is also used to analyse the usage of product at different times of the year.This warehouse reports the historical data stored in various databases like SQL Server and Flat Files.


Role & Responsibilities
· Was part at requirement gathering phase.
· Involved in preparing dashboards using calculations, parameters in Tableau.
· Creating calculated fields, groups, sets and hierarchies etc. for making better visualization.
· Generated context filters and data source filters while handling huge volume of data.
· Built dashboards for measures with forecast, trend line and reference lines.
· Published Workbooks by creating user filters so that only appropriate teams can view it.
· Scheduled extract refresh for weekly and monthly reports.
